content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on a bench at work texting my girlfriend, when i looked up and saw the light. the first thing in my mind was "there is no flight path there,what is that?" i could tell it was at the hight of jet liner, very high. but i coud see it was very large and a dull bright yellow.
 it was traveling very fast for how far up it was. i stopped texting and called my girlfriend and told her what i was seeing, because i knew it was unusual, how it came in from over the ocean and reached way over the hills in what had to be much less than five minutes.
 the most strange part about what i saw was the way the light seemed to zoom off towards the east sky and up in an instant out of sight.
 i use to work on a marine corp air station and have seen a lot of aircraft in flight, but this didn't act like anything i've ever seen before.
content.summary: It was bright yellow, and very high and large for its alttatude. it flew from west to east in an unusual flight path then it zipped away over the highlands.

content.detailedDescription: No it was indescribable!! if you would like to talk about with me then give me a call
content.summary: Red bright lights if i had to say what shape even though it was clear to me, i would say egg

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home with a friend, and i saw what i assumed was a plane, and jokingly said it was a ufo. it was moving slower than a most planes do, but figured it was nothing. the object was moving south-southwest. i turned down a street and the object was now going northeast, and looking in my reaview mirror, i could've sworn it stopped for a few seconds. noting this, i immediatly turned around and sped in the direction of teh object. at this point, both the object and me and my friend, in ym car are going north. i follwed it for about 5 blocks, and now it the object was going north-northwest. as far as i know the street i was on is almost perfectly north to south. i lost sight of the object when i got to the elevated train tracks.

this object turned faster than i know planes to be able to, and it was flying lower than most planes usually do. i also thought about it being a helicopter, but the placement of the lights was wrong.

i know there is a small airport a few towns over, but the shape, speed, and altitude seemed all wrong for it to be a small plane or helicopter.
content.summary: Bright low flying object turned from going south to going north quicker than a plan usually does.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were awakened by a loud thump on the back bumper of the car at 1:30am. we were parked off of county road 12 a couple miles past smith res. on a dirt road running across a small piece of land that i own there. upon waking, i realized that i needed to "relieve" myself and dreaded getting out of the car as i imagined the wind must really be blowing to cause all the tumbleweeds to be hitting the car as, after waking, we had heard several more "knocks" on various parts of the car. 
i opened the car door and there was not the slightest bit of wind blowing. i quickly shut the door and had to think hard as to whether or not i wanted to get out of the car without knowing what was around the car. i used a flashlight and car lights to try to distinguish the location of the noise. during this time, there was what sounded like something giving the antanne on top of the car a thump with subsequent twang noise. as we could see nothing and i still needed to relieve myself, i went on ahead and got out and squatted very close to the car to take care of business. there were not any sounds while i was outside and i actually used telepathy on the outside chance that i was dealing with "another" entity and asked that "whomever" not scare me while i was out of the car. i stated that i have a heart condition and that a fright could literally kill me. the noises did not start again until i got back in the car. none as loud as the original noise but persistant -- every 15 seconds to a minute in between. the noises were all over the car. i listened for scratches from claws but heard none and ruled out grasshoppers as some of the noises were too loud to be attributed to that. 
when i got up the next morning, i immediately got out of the car and checked the fine sand all around the car and found no tracks of any kind. i did spot what appeared to be raccoon tracks off of the road but nothing discernable around the car. my friend stated that she thought it might be the car cooling down but we had been parked since about 7:30 that evening and i've camped in the car before and have never experienced anything like that.
i will, of course, be car camping there again in the future and will let you know if i discover anything. there was also a female written about in the book "that crazy lady down the road" that had a similar experience.
the ufo phenomena has been a subject of interest to me for years and if you've heard of others who have had a similar experience, i would appreciate knowing.
content.summary: Unknown sounds like tumbleweeds being blown onto the car

content.detailedDescription: 7:30 pm pacific time washington state went out for a ciggerate looked up and noticed what i thought what was a star moving very quikly and upward. at first i thought it was debree from satelite but no trail and consistantly white much higher than air craft would travel and continuing to climb as it went north bound at high rate of speed.I would guess that it traveld from seattle to shoreline in less than 5 second's and than i lost sight because house was in the way.Judging how high in the sky it was and being able to see it so clearly it must of been really big.
content.summary: Looked like a star but moving faster than a jet upward and north

content.detailedDescription:
To whom it may concern.  i attempted to send this by regular email...All were retured.  the phone numbers i called were all out of service???
i am not usually paranoid, but a little is sometimes healthy.  hope this reaches you!
 
 
my name is w. loring warner.  i was in the u.S. coast guard from 5/65 through 5/69.  i was stationed at uscg air station, elizabeth city, nc where i was a radio man.  my duties included hf communications with airborne ascents,  monitoring 2182 mhz, the distress frequency for marine use, teletype network, and, on the mid-watch, listening to a vhf network of military installations  in the area.  this included bases in north carolina like cherry point.  norfolk and all the airbases. maryland and andrews afb. i had seen this system in operations several times when an aircraft was missing and resumed down.  one night something very strange happened.  at the time i wrote everything down as it happened, some four hours worth, but over the years and several hurricanes, the file was destroyed.  however, because i did write like a mad man, i do remember some key points. i can not be specific on the date except to say i believe it was summer, and the year had to be either 1967 or 1968.  
 
as soon as i heard the tone go off on the network speaker, i went into the pilot's ready room to listen.  eventually, many units were speaking with each other over this net.  andrews was tracking an object coming up the potomac river.  visual reports were being given first hand as to the size of the object. some station advised that they had deployed their theoda light to try to determine the altitude of the ufo. military  air assets already airborne confirmed the object from above the object. it was approaching washington dc.
as i said, this went on for as long as four hours i would say, and the hair on the back of my head stood up the entire time.  i knew i was listening to an historical event.   but there was never a mention of the event anywhere, anytime.  over the years i have been waiting for someone to bring this significant sighting to light, but it is as if it never happened.  it did happen in the dead of night, but should have been seen by some civilian, or law enforcement.  the military was in a near panic as they tracked the ufo and each base that reported had a different angle of view.  
 
it bothers me that such a significant event could go for this many years without having some type of discloser.  perhaps that is why i am writing this account. i am not given to exaggeration.
  
i am, however, a believer.  like faith in god, i believe on faith alone.  i have seen things i couldn't explain but could not classify as truly unidentified.  and although i experienced this event simply through the ears, there was no doubt about what they were seeing and how they dealing with it.  if i had to categorize their voices, it would resemble the bentwater recordings.
 
 
in conclusion, sceptics must be the most miserable people on earth.  i appreciate this opportunity to let you know abut this incident.  and i feel better for having shared it with someone who can perhaps shed some light on this unknown incident of an unknown flying object. i heard fear, amazement, concern and total concentration as to the implications of a second breach of dc by a ufo.  and, no one was joking about what was happening.
content.summary: Heard on vhf rescue net

content.detailedDescription: I was looking in the  sky about miles from the church at night and saw a disc figure. at first i thought it was in my head but got my cousin and he said bhe sees it to. then  about 20 mintues later it flew away fast!
content.summary: Not realy bright with a goldish color in the sky and not noisy

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my driveway smoking a ciggarette looking for ufo's of course and a star-like light caught my eye.  i knew it was'nt an ordinary air-craft when i noticed it did not blink.  it was moving at the speed of an airplane.  it shined the color of white for i believe ten seconds but then it would pulsate i believe the color blue.  i was hoping that it would stop and hover but  it was heading southeast from maryland.  i felt glorified and excited but then i became a little sick.  i lost sight of the object when it flew behind some trees.
content.summary: One light that would seem to stay white for 10 seconds but then pulsate i believe blue

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking in emmaus, pa, happened to look up and saw an aerial equilateral triangle with lights on its edges moving south slowly without noise.

this seemed to be the same object that i had seen in bethlehem, pa in 2000.

i thought that it was odd that i saw the same object moving at the same speed again and i again wanted it to land so i could meet the occupants.

i had no fear, just heightened curiosity.
content.summary: Aerial triangular object  with lights on edges moving slowly without noise.

content.detailedDescription:
Went out on second floor deck and saw a aerial equilateral triangle with lights on edges moving overhead without any noise at all. it moved from east to west. it moved in a straight line and eventually dropped below the hill line.

it was awesome and i wanted it to land in the yard but it didn't.

i called my then daughter-in-law outside and she saw it too.

i then lived in bethlehem, pa.
content.summary: Aerial triangular object  with lights on edges moving slowly without noise.

content.detailedDescription: While stationed at an army nike-hercules missle site in the upper penisula of maine, our radar units picked up a fast moving object approx 12 miles inside the canadian border. not only did we pick up the object but also the three other missle sites &  loring afb (a sac base) & also norad. the object was moving from west to east at approx 600 mph. our radar van officer & other van officers at the other missle sites tried to contact the object to identify itself. this was to no avail. our missles were up & ready to go if the object crossed the border. loring afb also had their jets in the air. suddenly the object immediately stopped, from 600 mph to "0" in an instant then went straight up. the radar has a glitch explained the van officer, & that was the end of it. of course 4 missle sites, a sac base, & norad all had the same glitch at the same time. i'm a firm believer & have been since then that their are ufo's "seeing is believing"
content.summary: Ufo flying along the canadian border

content.detailedDescription:
I was using my 7x50 binoculars to look for interesting tight groupings of stars. the sky was clear. i saw a dot of light directly overhead moving from west to east and thought it was a satellite. i looked away and realized that i could not see it with my unaided eyes. i did not move from my position. i looked again and the same dot of light was moving to starboard at 90 degrees to the original path. it had gone from an eastward path to a southward path in the time it took me to put down my binoculars and look through them again. i doubled checked with my naked eyes to make sure that i was looking at the same grouping of stars and used my binoculars again. it was still going south. it eventually dropped below the tree line.

my feeling was one of amazement. no satellite makes right turns. no high flying jet does that either without traversing an arced path which i would have noticed.

i realized that i had seen my first ufo. it was a humbling experience.
content.summary: Dot of light in night sky (only visible with my 7x50 binoculars) made a right turn instantaneously.

content.detailedDescription:
For fifty-one years, i have kept silent.  but now, because i may no longer be considered a hallucinating nut, i will tell my story. 

i did not see a ufo or a flying saucer.  but, what i saw was a saucer . . . unpainted silver metal . . . parked in a large well-lit hanger . . . fitting the classic description of a saucer . . . with the words united states air force painted on the disc���s top near the saucer���s edge.  

how i came to witness this craft is through a bizarre string of events.

in october 1956, my husband, who was an army ordinance armament engineer at the detroit arsenal in warren, michigan, and who had top security clearance, had orders to visit a research and development company in a los angeles suburb.  since his brother lived in la and had never met me and our three month old daughter, my husband made arrangements for us to accompany him. 

our commercial flight was to take off from the detroit airport and fly non-stop to la.  as i recall, it was to depart in the mid-afternoon and arrive at our destination in the early evening there.  for an unknown reason our flight was cancelled and all passengers were rerouted to other flights.  i remember how nervous i became because i was in the process of weaning my infant from breast to bottle and the delay would upset the feeding schedule.  this concern was relayed to the airline agent.

several hours passed and we were finally ushered onto the same plane that was the original aircraft scheduled to fly the cancelled flight.  no one else was on board except the crew.  it was explained that the plane had to be in los angeles for an early departure out from there the next day, so it would fly dead-head.  it all sounded plausible.  

we were told that we would fly over the grand canyon and with such a clear moonlit night, we should see it clearly.  the stewardesses and an officer joined us for visits and we were treated like royalty with food and drink.  i did not drink, but my husband had more than enough and was soon in a deep sleep.  after i saw the grand canyon, i closed my eyes and tried to rest.  even though it was very dark out, the stewardess lowered my husband���s and my window shades (we were sitting across the aisle from each other).  in a short while, we started to descend.  at first, i thought we had arrived in la so i raised my shade.

the airport we landed at was a large complex with many hangers and single-storied buildings, but i don���t recall seeing any that resembled a terminal.  since i had never been to la before, i still assumed we were there.  the plane came to a stop far from any buildings for only a few minutes.  i heard little sounds and low voices somewhere in the plane.  then we taxied further down the tarmac to the end and turned to roll down another runway.  that���s when i saw the large hanger with its doors completely open and all the lights on.  inside stood a saucer shaped disc that filled the center of the hanger.  it had a clear dome on the top-center and stood on three legs.  various objects were attached, protruding out from the edge and underside.  the words united states (star emblem) air force were painted on the top disc near the saucer���s edge.  no one was in sight in or around the hanger.

i was shocked, but completely fascinated.  i didn���t believe in ufos or saucers, but here was one about 150 to 200 yards from me in plain sight.  i tried to wake my husband so he could see it too, but it was useless.  i had about two minutes to observe the craft as we completed the turn and rolled past it.  then, we made another turn and picked up speed for take-off.  i don���t recall seeing any city lights in the area.

when i saw the stewardess again, i asked her about the stop and the place that we landed at.  i didn���t mention the craft i saw, probably because i may have still been in shock or maybe because i was aware that i���d seen something i shouldn���t have.  i can���t remember her exact words, but she soothed me and said they just had to make a quick stop to drop something off, that it was nothing and would not delay our arrival time in la.  it seemed like we were aloft for a short while before we started our descent to la.

when we arrived at la and my husband finally woke up, i told him about it, but he was in a grouchy mood and told me i was crazy.  there was a rash of sightings in the 1950s and he scoffed at all of the witnesses���so did i.  later that night and several more times, i told him about the air force disc.  each time he got angry at me.  he said i made it up or that i was  hallucinating.  he kept insisting that we were on a through-flight and there were no stops.  he told me to shut up about it���that people would think i was nuts and it would affect his job, so i spoke of it no more.  every time i thought of that craft, my pulse seemed to race a little, but in time, i stopped thinking about it.  i also stopped scoffing.

i can���t explain why no one else but we were allowed to board that plane.  neither can i figure out why the hanger doors were completely open with no technicians or guards in sight.  

i really don't know for sure where we landed.  after telling this story to a test-pilot friend he suggested that it may have been in groom lake, nevada.  but i couldn't swear to it.

i���ve often wondered how many hundreds or maybe thousands of people worked on this project and how many more knew about it.  as fantastic as this project was (is), i believe that the greatest accomplishment is in convincing people not to admit to it at any level.  that really boggles my mind!
content.summary: 51 years ago i saw a large silver saucer-shaped craft parked in a well lit hanger with united states air force painted on it.

content.detailedDescription: My brother dalton and i were walking out to my car when we witnessed a bright object in the eastern sky moving south.  object was more luminescent than any other object currently in sky which made it very obvious and easily caught our attention. the object was visible for about 30 seconds and moved about 15 to 20 degrees in all until it started to dim, and eventually vanished altogether over about 7 seconds. upon further thought, it is possible the object was in fact moving southeast instead of south, at a very high rate of speed which would explain the dimming and vanishing. i have had experience as a student pilot and have been watching aircraft my whole life. the object had no strobe, no winglights, no red beacon on tail, and the intensity of the light was much brighter than any military aircraft would logically have installed on their planes. of the high volume of commercial aircraft that regularly fly overhead the area from john wayne airport, this object shared nothing in common with them. on an extra note, it is impossible for the object to be a meteor or other space-debris, i am also an ametuer star-gazer and don't mistake celestial objects with mechanical vehicles.
content.summary: Very bright star-like

content.detailedDescription: Somebody i know emailed me the picture of that recent thing posted here from out west, don't remember which state.  this object floated above the river for maybe less than 30 seconds, rotating slightly then winking out.  my wife freaked out because we were still about 40 minutes from takeout and had know where to go.  we paddled over to the side and sat in the woods for about 20-30 minutes, but the mosquitos were eating us alive, so we got back in the water.  i got one photo off before it dissapeared.  about 10 seconds before it dissappeared another circle thing seemed to pop out of the center, which is when my wife started screaming at me to take a picture, and that's what you see.  i really don't want to know what it was, because to this day it gives us the creeps, but since i saw the other one my wife thought it might be best to share the experience.  i'm not going to mention the name of the river because our cabin is near there.
content.summary: Weird shaped object sighted while tubing down river

content.detailedDescription:
From a discussion group i posted to the morning following my sighting: 

"i  believe i saw a black triangle craft last night...
 
last night i was driving my son to his karate class. it was 18:10 and dark. we were waiting at some traffic lights in town when my eye was caught by a low-flying plane crossing the road ahead and disappearing to the right behind some buildings.
'wow!' i said to my son. 'that plane's really low'. it seemed to be only 60 or 70 feet or so off the ground. we watched where it had gone for a moment and it suddenly came back into view as though it had just turned around, right where it was. 'must be a helicopter' we thought - it was still very low and manouvreing like a helicopter.
we continued to watch it until the traffic lights turned to green and we moved forward. it wasn't until we were about 100 yards or so closer that we realised it wasn't a helicopter. this object was basically triangular in shape though its corner points were missing and it had various coloured lights - i distinctly remember red, white and green along it's edges. unlike aircraft lights which flash, these lights were pulsing slowly lighter and darker as though 'breathing' over a two to three second period. 
i know that many reports of black triangle craft describe them as huge, football-field sized craft (for example, those described by colm kelleher, previously of the national instiutute for discovery science organisation [nids] in america), but the craft my son and i were observing would only have been about 30 feet on each side.
we watched astounded as it weaved its way around, approx 60 feet above ground level, at a distance of about 100 yards from us. we continued to move with the traffic and my son watched as we moved. i kept an eye on this thing in my door mirror (that's how low it was). eventually it moved over the roof of a b&q hardware centre and went out of sight.
on our way back home an hour or so later, i looked over to this centre. it was unusual in that it had large illuminated light panels in its roof and a large illuminated canopy over its gardening section. of all the buildings in the vicinity, this was the only structure that actively directed light upwards and so may have 'attracted' the craft. the centre also had a tall, 20 feet raor-wired compound area. i noticed a strobe-alarm light had been set off inside. additionally, i noticed there was a power pylon immediately behind the store. we last saw the craft moving towards this pylon."

we lost sight of the object when the traffic lights changed and we moved forward with the traffic turning into taunton road, losing sight of the object behind buildings.

i attach a digital sketch i made of how the craft looked from where we sat in the traffic
content.summary: 30-50 ft black triangular craft illuminated at each corner

content.detailedDescription:
At about 5:45 am, my 17 year old daughter woke me in an excited state. while eating breakfast, she and her 15 year old sister noticed lights out of the window low on the western horizon just above the line of rooftops. by the time i was up and out there, one had disappeared, but two were distinctly visible. at arms length, each about the size of a peanut, perhaps slightly larger. one was higher than the other, but both still below my own roofline. they both hovered about 5-10 minutes, with steady lights of blue, green and red.  by green, i mean a light turquoise. as i watched, trying to set up a telescope, but was unsuccessful in spotting them before they began to move off, one seemed to grow smaller and turn orange and began to move to my right. at first i thought it was moving directly away from my position as if it were moving off into the distance, but then i realized that it was moving in a straight line, slowly on a horizontal plane. i ran around to the front of my house and could watch it moving further until it disappeared from view behind rooftops. the other light disappeared as i was watching this one.

they both told me that they had watched it for 3-5 minutes before waking me. the first had a dark, saucer shaped silhouette and had descended below the rooftops before re-emerging. they described the lights' patterns as an x shape of 5 lights. i thought it more as a diamond pattern. there was absolutely no sound.

later, about 20 minutes later, i actually saw another set of lights, but conventional colors and could easily hear the sound of a helicopter. the helicopter was not in the same quandrant of the sky and did not seem to be related. the point being that i could hear this one clearly and not the other two at all.
content.summary: Three distinct multi-colored groupings (red, blue, green)

content.detailedDescription:
I'm the founder of the denton area paranormal society (daps). fellow daps investigators, bob and todd (names changed to protect their identity), came forward at our meeting on february 19th with a mind-blowing story. 

what follows is my recounting of what befell bob on a fateful date in january 2008...

having caught a late night movie at a theater in the area, bob dropped off his friend, todd, before heading home. with the soaring price of gas, bob decided to take a deserted country road back to his place, which served as a shortcut. around 1:45am in the early morning of jan 21st, bob drove east on copper canyon rd. driving over a railroad crossing, at a sharp bend in the road, something otherworldly suddenly appeared from behind a tree to his left! 

(the attached photo was taken of the illustration todd drew, after bob reported to him that he'd seen an "alien" in late january.)

slamming on his brakes, bob was stunned as a thin, gaunt, hairless, long arm, long legged creature, suddenly was caught in the high beams of his headlights. less than 20 feet away, this weird, 5 foot tall, slumped forward, long fingered entity darted smoothly across the road, alarmingly in 2 seconds flat! however, the real shocker came when it stopped under the yellow light of a streetlamp looming overhead, then turned, glancing in his direction!

like the eyes of a cat, yellow light reflected back at bob as he tried fighting off the fear of the unknown. a riot of conflicting emotions and questions flooded over him. what the hell was it? what was it going to do? 

even as all this began welling up, he stared wide-eyed and shaken, as the unexplained nocturnal visitor silently turned and resumed fast, gracefully sliding strides, thankfully away to his right. bob's mind whirled as he watched it quickly squeeze through the partially open gate of a driveway. within moments, while bob's lungs finally filled with short, agitated breaths, the thing vanished into a line of woods on the far side of a field to the se. 

it was so difficult for bob to come to terms, let alone grasp, what to do after seeing something so profoundly peculiar, at such point blank range. in an absolute state of shock, the rest of his drive home was a blur. closing and locking the door firmly behind him, the true nature of reality wrestled with everything he had personally ever known. therefore, it was only natural that he refrained from openly sharing what had happened, fearful people would think him crazy. 

eventually though, he told his friend, todd, days later. being something of a hand as a graphic artist, todd worked extensively with bob to successfully reproduce the detailed illustration of the being i've termed, the creature of copper canyon.

if all this wasn't already amazing enough, earlier that very evening, around the stroke of midnight, my wife, mary, and i witnessed a glowing, amber colored, chevron shaped object zooming through the sky. the ufo appeared to only be about 1000 feet up, and moved like a stone skipping across the surface of the water. looking up through our car's wind shield, we watched the flying object travel se down mckinney rd, for the approximate 2 seconds it was visible.

(the ufo picture was taken by charles miller, in north carolina, in 2007; found posted on http://www.Ufo-reports.Com. i felt compelled to include it due to the astonishing similarity between it and the one my wife and i briefly saw on january 20th, 2008.

remarkably, tuesday, february 26th, bob phoned, saying he had found the ticket stub, i'd asked him to look for, from the movie he had seen the night of his incident. our mutual exclamations of surprise must have reverberated for miles, as nagging suspicion became instant realization. the ufo we had seen took place only a few hours before bob's sighting of the creature of copper canyon! 

through getting the image and story out into the arena of public opinion, which has begun by appearing on www.Coasttocoastam.Com, we're hopeful that our observations and ongoing research into this bizarre chain of events, may engender others to come forward and share what they know. 

below is a link to a forum thread i made to discuss the creature of copper canyon and ufo sightings in denton, texas area ���
http://ufocasebook.Conforums.Com/index.Cgi?Board=worldwide&action=display&num=1204321417

thank you,
lance oliver, founder
denton area paranormal society
http://www.Dapsghost.Com
content.summary: Humanoid - creature of copper canyon

content.detailedDescription: While on my way back from a late doctors appointement, my friend gale and i noticed a flash of blue lightning to our left.It remained "lit up" for a long count of approximately 2 to 3 seconds. she stopped the car and we were looking at the spot where it had been. then it (the lightning) happened again. this time we saw definition and it stayed lit up for another long count of 2 to three seconds. it looked like it was coming from an object 70 ft. or less off the ground. we could see the dark outline of something and the lightning came out of the bottom of it. the lightning looked like it was in a glowing martini glass. the top of the "glass" tapered down to the "stem" and the lightning went through the center of it. there is a small hill in the back of the object and it was below the top of it. we couldn't see exactly what it was but it was not small. i would say it was about 100 ft. long and 30 ft. high. the "martini glass" was fairly large and it glowed off the bottom of the craft. there was no sound as with lightning and it was very bright. gale and i looked at each other and she said "nobody is going to believe this". the object was less than a quarter mile away. there was no sound at any time. then it just disappeared. the next morning a friend dropped over by my house and i asked her if she had noticed anything "weird" last night. she (very excitedly) said "you mean the blue lightning"? i said yes and she told me that her and her boyfriend and my landlord and other people down the street she had talked to saw it also and they were all talking about how beautiful it was and how it was so strange that there was no thunder and how it lit up the whole area. we didn't get a good look at the object but for an outline of it against the hill. it definately was something that none of us had ever witnessed before. i,ve heard that there is a small resevoir below where it was hovering. truly mysterious.
content.summary: Low craft emitting bluish .Lightning with no thunder

content.detailedDescription:
As the founder of the denton area paranormal society, three others and i had returned to the location where a fellow investigator, bob, had eyewitnessed an "alien" crossing a rural road on january the 21st, 2008. while on location where this incident had taken place, bob repeatedly expressed feelings of being watched. none of us present saw anything obvious in evidence to cause this. however, something i can't put my finger on literally gave me the willies; hair raising, a unexplained gut feeling of something strange, a rare thing in my book. 

when i left, my odd sensation of something unexplained going on held on until i pulled into an exxon a couple of miles away for a cup of coffee. an unusual chill nagged at me, which i can't solely contribute to the cool weather, but i shook it off as i drove the 5 miles home. yet, the capper of the evening happened after i pulled into my driveway and parked. 

as soon as i got out of my car, and looked into the clear, starry, northern sky, i was surprised to see a fast, glowing, diffuse light appear. approximately 45 degrees up from the horizon, it travelled east to west, in a slight arc that appeared to take it a little further away and downward from my perspective. it was there and gone in a second. 

what made this so truly amazing to me, is that this sighting was strikingly similar to the previous sighting my wife and i had on january 20th, 2008, which we now know occured hours before bob's sighting of what i've named the creature of copper canyon! 

it was hard for me to believe, let alone admit, sighting another object in the same area, since no one was with me when i saw it flying by. it's just my word, but it did happen. perhaps someone else in denton happened to be looking north the same time it was here and gone.

thanks,
lance oliver, founder
denton area paranormal society
www.Dapsghost.Com
content.summary: Northern sky, a fast, glowing, diffuse light , approximately 45 degrees up from the horizon, travelled east to west!

content.detailedDescription: First noticed this at sunrise. the shape appeared to be round and was translucent. remained stationary for about 6 hours. eventually the object dissappeared but i did not witness its departure. it may have been some sort of balloon but the fact that it remained in one position has me wondering. attached is a photograph. three other people with me saw this object.
content.summary: Translucent  sphere in sky stationary for 6 hours

content.detailedDescription: At around 7:30pm i heard a very loud roar of a low flying jet go over my house. a few minutes latter i walked outside. i glanced up and saw 2 round pulsing red lights...One fallowing the other. i was looking west and they were moving s-sw at a very fast speed. i did not hear any sound..As they grew smaller on the horizon i heard jet planes aproaching from the north going in the same direction. thats it. i live in a very heavy air traffic area and have never seen lights like these...Nor have i seen any aircraft move that fast. it is also very rare to hear jets flying so low.
content.summary: Red pulsing lights

content.detailedDescription:
I had the most amazing sighting with my 19 year old nephew, who had two completely unrelated sightings that day. 

i was driving along with him riding passenger, and he yells out "ufo
alert", and i turned to see the most amazing thing.  flying beneath the
cloud covered skies was a formation of about 10-15 glowing orbs. egg or football shaped.

they were being flanked by another craft, bigger and with more lights.  it
was almost like it was shepherding them, because it's the only ship that
would break formation.  this happened at about 10 pm est in youngstown,
ohio. it was the most surreal experience of my life. it lasted about 15 seconds before the fleet went into the clouds and disappeared.
content.summary: My nephew and i saw a fleet of ufos flying in formation

content.detailedDescription:
Simply told. i was working with a wine salesmen in san diego and at about 5:30 we were heading towards old town and 4 lights appeared across the horizon. they looked like they were connected and then they disappeared.  a moment later the lights reappeared.  we were pretty amazed. that was it. these lights were rather sizable given their distance.

i didn't know what to think it was.

cam
content.summary: Looked like a string of four lights

content.detailedDescription: After three day of fires in washoe county nevada over a three day period. i filmed this disk ufo flying around the mountain of sun valley nevada.
content.summary: White disk.

content.detailedDescription: Just after dusk i was outside of a friends house to take my dog out for a walk and in the process i took a look at the sky. as i was facing east i noticed what seemed like a flock of birds flying in formation over hwy us 19. as i stood and watched it, it began to reveal itself as a dark traingle with about 6 white lights along the underside. i would say that the craft was about 800 ft or so above the ground and was moving directly over hwy us 19 from south to north. the speed of movement was fairly slow for aircraft,but, it would be hard for me to judge the actual speed. i aventualy lost sight of the object as it moved north and out of my view.
content.summary: Dark traiangle with 6 whites lights

content.detailedDescription:
I spent the summer if 1981 with a rancher by the name of pat mcguire in laramie.  we were working for black cat fireworks out of rawlins.  we spent a couple of weeks shipping fireworks all over the state.  on the evening of 7/2/81 about 11:30 we left rawlins and headed for laramie with a pick up truck loaded with fireworks.  my five year old son was sleeping on the passenger seat with his legs on the floor of the truck and his head resting on the seat.  about a half an hour out of rawlins, i looked up and saw three very bright, large objects lined up in a row.  i said to pat, "look at those stars!"  i had no sooner said that when the center object descended at a incredible rate of speed and came straight for our windshield.  i screamed and yelled, "it's going to ram us!"  i kept thinking that that thing did not have air brakes!  as soon as i said that the object stopped and descended slowing to the pavement less than 100 ft from our truck.  we were stopped by that time on the side of the road.  all traffic on interstate 80 stopped and all head lights went out.  

one of the obects was to the north of us by that time and was being pursued by a jet, i assume out of warren afb in cheyenne.  there was also an object to the south of us and it was keeping equal distance at all times from the ground, which was very hilly.  

i started to get out of the truck and was stopped by pat.  he said wait until you are invited.  i thought to myself that this was an invitation.  

i looked back to the object that was to the north of us and the jet was still chasing it.  all of a sudden it looked as if the jet had just stopped in midair!  then i realized that the object picked up speed and left the jet behind.

the object that had landed on the highway in front of us was as big as a house.  all i could see was a brilliant light.  i could not see past the light.  then all of a sudden the object disappeared in front of our eyes.  it did not take off that i could see, it just disappeared.  i felt a terrible loss when this event ended.  i really did want to go with them, even though i was afraid at first. 

the whole event seemed to take only about 20 minutes, but when we got to laramie about 1-1/2 hours from rawlins it was almost 3:00 am already.  

i started having dreams about the incident shortly after and did recall being inside the object. 

this incident was reported to leo sprinkle, phd after the event had happened and also has been included in a book written by tim beckley, inner light publishing and myself.  

after the event ended traffic on interstate 80 had returned to normal.  i do not know if anyone else has reported this incident or not.
content.summary: Three ufos about 40 degrees, center one descended and landed on interstate 80 east

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting a friend at black lake village in the nipomo, ca area when i decided to take my two dogs out for a short potty break. i was on my way back to the house when i stopped to let the dogs sniff around. while they were occupied, i looked up at the stars, enjoying the evening.  i looked for the big dipper, found it, then started to look for other constellations.  i was trying to remember which star in the big dipper was supposed to point to the little dipper and started going out from each side of the dipper to see if i could find it.  when i looked out to the northwest, i saw a very high star-like object moving across the sky from east to west.  i watched it for a couple of minutes trying to decide what it was.  it was too high to be a plane. it was right up there as high as some of the stars. i thought about a satellite, but the satellites i have seen from this area did not follow that path, but travelled from west to east.  i was puzzled. it had to be a satellite, i thought, because it was so small and so high.  just then it abrubtly reversed its course---it simply stopped as though it had hit a wall and went straight back--no turns or change in path involved.  right then i knew it wasn't a satellite. i continued to watch and it went forward again, then suddenly went straight up in the air vertically, then straight down vertically, then back to its original path.  it continued doing these same manuevers as i watched for another minute or so. i could not believe what i was seeing. no plane or satellite that i was aware of could do that. i was very close to the front door of my friend's house and, although i was afraid i would lose sight of it, i really wanted someone else to see what i was seeing, so i ran to the front door and called my friend to come out.  he did, but when i got back to look for it and show him, it was not visible. i watched for a three or four more minutes, but could not find it. i went in the house and did not look any more because everyone else teased me and was skeptical.
content.summary: Starlike moving across sky, able to stop and reverse, go straight up and down rapidly

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a boat on the hudson river & we stopped for awhile and i took some photos.
the object wasn't visible when i shot the photo but appeared after it was downloaded.

there also may be another one that i just noticed, not sure though. it's a spec at about the 10 o'clock position above the three masted schooner.

i've attached 2 photos.  the one i took and i've cropped the other one to show the detail.
i'm not sure of the exact time but it was around sunset.

i also have another pic where the same thing happened but this was in maine. i'll send it separately.
content.summary: Not visible while taking photo, came up after download

content.detailedDescription: My future wife and i were sitting on the front porch of her old house in dawson,mn at approx. 8ish at night when we spotted a set of, what appeared to be retangular lights in a triangular pattern, moving from the east to the west. when it was directly above us, i noticed that i could see an outline of a triangular object that literally blocked all stars in between the set of lights. it moved very fast and very quietly. i ran out into the street to get a better view and by the time i really was able to comprehend what i was seeing, it had gone over the house and was gone from view. i was in awe, i couldnt believe what i was seeing. i estimate that it was roughly severaly hundred feet off the ground and was massive in size. estimated guess would put tailend of the craft at aprrox. 150' in length. i knew right away what i was looking at, i know what i saw. i've served in the u.S. navy in san diego and have seen many kinds of specialized aircraft and what i saw that night was something that i had never seen before or anything like since. the wife tried to say it was a tri-pod(3 meteorites fall in sync), something i had a very hard hard time accepting. it left no trails, wasn't a fireball and lights were to symmetric to be an anomaly. to this day, i am still baffled by what we saw that night.
content.summary: Huge black mass w/ 3 rectangular lights in a triangular pattern
